summary: Painful family events lead Augusta to leave Italy. On a small boat, immersed in the Amazon Forest grandness, she begins a travel between Indios villages. From the favela to the isolation in the Forest, Augusta will go in search of herself.
cast: Jasmine Trinca|Anne Alvaro|Sonia Gessner|Pia Engleberth|Federica Fracassi|Amanda Fonseca Galvao|Paulo De Souza|Nilson Trindade Miquiles|Manuela Mendonça Marinho|Eder Frota Dos Santos|Tereza Benevides Schermuly Santos|Leonardo Farias Dos Santos|Nilton Avani Rodrigues|João Paulo Da Silva Santos|Debora Da Silva Medeiros|Janio Pinto De Souza|Leonardo Fernando Souza Farias|Isabel De Assis Miranda|Davide Tuniz|Tuchaua Alfonso Miniz Miguilis|Derli Baston Batista|Aldo Albuquerque|Arnoldo Chaves|Saveriano Pedrosa Moreira|Mário Jorge Menezes Gonçalves|Marlúcia Bota Araújo|Fredo Valla|Sara Peixoto Moreira|Keity Ane Vieira Marialva|Josivan Cleto Menezes Barreto|Giovanni Marco Gerbaldo|Ottavio Pinna|Carlo Ponta|Carlos Renee De Souza Fernandes|Francisco Moura|Valciney Silva|Natanael Santos|Neto Nilson Ramos|Miguel Messias|Frank Nacimento Carvalho|Diego Nascimento|Claudia Marcia Santos Amorim|Suelane Dos Santos Gomes
title: Un giorno devi andare
